alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 7:10PM CDT until June 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/. * At 710 PM CDT/610 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Imperial, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Imperial, Wauneta, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Crete, Chase, Center Dam Campground, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 57. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
